title: Tezos Web3API
body:
## Proposal Overview

Web3API DAO is seeking a development team to build the Tezos Web3API.  This team is expected to apply for the [Tezos Foundation Grant]([https://grants.tezos.foundation/proposals/grant_process_information/create_proposal/887a1c08-ecba-496f-a8b3-394e1ce7988e](https://grants.tezos.foundation/proposals/grant_process_information/create_proposal/887a1c08-ecba-496f-a8b3-394e1ce7988e)).  If a grant is rewarded, Web3API DAO will be a co-sponsor and match the grant in `W3API`, up to a specified amount (outlined in "Proposal Options").

## Why Tezos?

This will be a challenging project, and in the progress of developing the Tezos Web3API, we can expect to learn more about the issues and strengths of our toolchain.  We're impressed by the Tezo's team and their support for their developers; we believe that they'll help make this project a success.

## Proposal options

- #### Match up to 35 `W3API`
- #### Match up to 50 `W3API`
- #### Match up to 75 `W3API`
- #### Do not co-sponsor a Tezos Web3API (Reject proposal)
- #### Other (message keeevin#7783 on Discord for requested changes)
author: 0x937F5b32Bc3cafcd1B02462F93e6AE5a843f6C6A
